Detailed Description

Functions to query and control GNOME Screensaver.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
This module deals with communicating through DBUS and gconf to GNOME Screensaver.

Definition in file gpm-screensaver.c.

Function Documentation

gboolean gscreensaver_get_idle (  gint *  time  ) 
 

Lock the screen using GNOME Screensaver.

Parameters:
time The returned idle time, passed by ref.
Returns:
TRUE if we got a valid idle time.

gboolean gscreensaver_lock_check (  void   ) 
 

If set to lock on screensave, do so.

Instruct gnome-screensaver to lock screen if set gconf, if not to lock, then do nothing, and return FALSE.

Returns:
TRUE if we locked the screen
